title: Update Failed.   Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
body:
I have read through a number of posts about this issue but, I don't think anyone has heard from Riot.  I know that there are also some posts on the EU page.  So far, I have tried the Hextech Repair tool.  I have tried a clean uninstall and reinstall (I had to reinstall from the install wizard pulled by the Hextech Repair Tool).  I have updated and tried a different DNS Server.  I have deleted every file that has anything to do with League of Legends and reinstalled from there.  I am having no luck.  I am currently going through COX Communications for my ISP and following is my Tracert info.  I am running a windows 10 PC and everything is up to date.


Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     5 ms     4 ms     2 ms  192.168.0.1 
  2    22 ms    27 ms    19 ms  10.15.32.1 
  3    34 ms    13 ms    14 ms  100.127.40.32 
  4    16 ms    19 ms    20 ms  172.22.51.64 
  5    19 ms    18 ms    28 ms  ashbbprj01-ae2.rd.as.cox.net [68.1.0.242] 
  6    51 ms    34 ms    30 ms  68.105.31.202 
  7    17 ms    23 ms    20 ms  104.160.137.35 
  8    42 ms    32 ms    27 ms  ae32-br01.pdx02.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.21] 
  9    37 ms    46 ms    39 ms  ae31-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.14] 
 10    47 ms    41 ms    34 ms  104.160.131.34 
 11    39 ms    46 ms    44 ms  104.160.131.46 
 12    39 ms   134 ms    69 ms  104.160.131.101 
 13     *       44 ms    55 ms  192.64.170.1 

Trace complete.


What else do you need to help me figure out my problem.

replies.body: try install new autoupdate for win10 that help for me
The unspecified error can occur for varying reasons depending on when you received it.  At what percent during the patcher did you get an unspecified error?  Let me know!
